name: Counting Stars (Marc Mas Vidal)
description:
IMPORTANT: help button shows some points that are in the form, but not all.

IMPORTANT (WEB): if you play the web version, make sure to play it fullscreen so you can see all screen.

I have made this game alone. I'm usually a game designer, but for this game I did all (music, art, programming, design...). Furthermore, I want to thank freesounds.com for the SFX and pexels.com for the images.
